      • changePosition

        public void changePosition(double x,
                           double y,
                           java.util.ArrayList<City> otherCities)
                    throws IllegalPositionException,
                           DuplicatePlaceException
        This method changes the coordinates of the city.
        Parameters:
        x - the new x-coordinate.
        y - the new y-coordinate
        otherCities - The other cities located in the drawing area.
        Throws:
        IllegalPositionException - if the moved city steps outside of the drawing area.
        DuplicatePlaceException - if the moved city overlap another city.
